pr_title: Added a check to VariantAnnotator that all read samples are present in the VCF

timeline.message: added a validation check that all samples in the input bam are present in the provided vcf before running variant annotator

timeline.bodyText: This checks whether the samples in the bam are present in the vcf. But the original bug report in #6915 was (according to @gbrandt6 ) triggered by the reverse case where samples in the vcf don't exist in the bam.
timeline.author: droazen

replies.bodyText: Upon further investigation, @jamesemery and I confirmed that this patch is correct, and the original bug report was backwards. The NPE is triggered when there are samples in the bam not present in the vcf.
replies.author: droazen

replies.bodyText: Thanks for looking into it @droazen @jamesemery I checked again and it looks like the user said there were no samples in common.
replies.author: gbrandt6
jamesemery
